ui-framework-packages.name: Ant Design
ui-framework-packages.description: A fully featured Ant Design System UI Framework support. Includes +20 Table, Form, Select, Menu, Layout, Notification and CRUD components and hooks.

ui-framework-packages.name: Material UI
ui-framework-packages.description: A fully featured Material UI Framework support. Includes DataGrid (Pro included), AutoComplete, Menu, Layout, Notification and CRUD components and hooks.

ui-framework-packages.name: Mantine UI
ui-framework-packages.description: A fully featured React component library. Build fully functional accessible web applications faster than ever – Mantine includes more than 100 customizable components and 40 hooks to cover you in any situation
